snippet.title: Set Sail! Arena - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to the Arena scallywags! Set Sail! Arena is a 4v4 PVP Arena Action game. Face off against your friends as Pirates or British, across unique maps and modes. Customise your character and fight with swords, pistols and a variety of Power Weapons! Featuring:

· 8 Player Pirate PVP!
· 2 Game Modes (at launch)
· 4 Maps (at launch)
· 6 Characters (at launch)

· FREE post launch updates for all players, bringing new maps, modes, characters, consumables and power weapons to the Arena, as well as consistent bug fixes, patches and quality of life changes.

· Partnership with WDC, Whale and Dolphin Conservation, supporting their vital work protecting whales and dolphins across the globe. £1 of your purchase will go to WDC! (Dragon Scale Studios will donate £1 (GBP) per sale of Set Sail! Arena to WDC, Whale and Dolphin Conservation. WDC is a UK registered charity no. 1014705.)

· Play for free during the World Ocean Day Sale and Steam Next Fest from 7-17th June

· Launching June 28th, only on Steam, for £7.99 (25% off for the first 7 days!).

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2830710/Set_Sail_Arena/

#pirategame #indiegame #newgame #multiplayergames #pvpgames #indiedev
